name: Doctor Hogback
text: On Play: Return 2 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order: put up to one (Thriller Bark) card other than "Doctor Hogback" from your trash to your hand.

effect.text: Return 2 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order: put up to one (Thriller Bark) card other than "Doctor Hogback" from your trash to your hand.
